articles.description: Fans will remember the experienced anti-corruption officer from the previous series, when she was brought in as an independent investigator from AC-3 to look into Superintendent Hastings.
articles.content:
Line Of Duty's series five scene-stealer DCS Patricia Carmichael is set to return to the BBC drama. 
DCS Carmichael, played by BAFTA award winner Anna Maxwell Martin, will appear from Sundays episod… [+16905 chars]

articles.author: James Gordon
articles.title: Piers Morgan brands Sheryl Underwood shameless fraud as The Talk returns Sharon Osbourne forced quit - Daily Mail
articles.description: Piers Morgan has taken to Twitter calling Sheryl Underwood 'a shameless fraud'. It came after Underwood  claimed she has been suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD).
articles.content:
Piers Morgan has branded Sheryl Underwood, 58,  a 'shameless fraud' as the co-host of CBS's The Talk returned to screens after fellow host Sharon Osbourne, 67, was forced to quit for defending him.
… [+7518 chars]

articles.description: There have been many tributes paid to reality star Nikki Grahame since her tragic death on Friday with those who starred with her in Big Brother having their say on the legendary housemate
articles.content:
Nikki Grahame's tragic death at the age of 38 sent shockwaves through the Big Brother family, with fans, relatives and friends all devastated by her passing.
